       <h2>
        Are You Tomorrow Proof?
       </h2>
       <p>
        The future belongs to those who will be able to reinvent themselves — over and over in their lifetimes. That’s why we focus so intently on helping you hone critical thinking skills, deﬁne your creative abilities and master your communication skills.

  <script>
   var newsList = "";
        var newsItem = "";
        $.ajax({
            url: "https://www.umt.edu/news/featured.json.php",
            dataType: "json",
            async: false,
            cache: false,
            success: function(data) {
                $.each(data.posts, function(i, v) {
                    newsItem = '';
                    newsItem += '<li class="col-md-4 news-item">';
                    newsItem += '<a href="'+v.link+'" target="_parent">';
                    if(v.image === undefined){
                        newsItem += '<img src="https://www.umt.edu/_files/images/news-img.jpg" alt="'+v.title+'" class="mb-3 w-100 d-none d-md-block" />';
                    }else{
                        newsItem += '<img src="'+v.image+'" alt="'+v.title+'" class="mb-3 w-100 d-none d-md-block" />';
                    }
                    newsItem += '<div class="fs-19">'+v.title+'</div>';
                    newsItem += ' </a>';
                    newsItem += '</li>';
                    newsList += newsItem;
                    return i < (6 - 1);
                });
                    $("#jsonnewsblockr9-news-feed").prepend(newsList);
            },
            error: function(data) {
                if (data.status == 200) {
                    console.log("JSON Not Valid: https://www.umt.edu/news/featured.json.php");
                } else {
                    console.log("URL Not Found: https://www.umt.edu/news/featured.json.php");
                }
            }
        });
  </script>

  </script>
